title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-image
author: LinOnetwo
name: github-external-image
description: When publish to Github Pages, use github as your image storage, add _canonical_uri to all image, pointing to raw.github.
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/github-external-image/">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/github-external-image/"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/github-external-image/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/github-external-image/"/></$button>

!! Usage

Please fill in [[$:/GitHub/Repo]] and [[$:/config/linonetwo/github-external-image/tiddler-folder-name]] to get started.

Then, on build, all images will be replaced by place holders.

Please use following build target:

```json
"externalimages": [
  "--setfield",
  "[is[binary]] [type[application/msword]]",
  "_canonical_uri",
  "$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image",
  "text/plain",
  "--setfield",
  "[is[binary]] [type[application/msword]]",
  "text",
  "$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image",
  "text/plain",
  "--rendertiddler",
  "$:/core/save/all",
  "index.html",
  "text/plain"
],
```
